meaningMnemonic: This <radical>net</radical> is for <radical>someone</radical> who works in a <kanji>government office</kanji>. You'll also take someone from a <kanji>political office</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Government office</kanji> and <kanji>political office</kanji> people put on the best <reading>show</reading>s (しょ). That's why you want to capture someone from there with your net.
